original_text: I know, and am persuaded by the Lord Jesus, that there is nothing unclean of itself: but to him that esteemeth any thing to be unclean, to him it is unclean.
korean_text: 내가 주 예수 안에서 알고 확신하노니 무엇이든지 스스로 속된 것이 없으되 다만 속되게 여기는 그 사람에게는 속되니라

sentences.original_text: and am persuaded by the Lord Jesus
that there is nothing unclean of itself
sentences.korean_translation: 그것 자체로 부정한 것은 아무것도 없다는 것을

sentences.original_text: but to him that esteemeth any thing to be unclean
